title: Assassin Master
description: ShadowHunter is a silent assassin, striking from the shadows with unmatched precision. His speed and stealth make him deadly in close combat and difficult to detect.
details: He excels in night operations, using dual blades and shadow cloaking. ShadowHunter leads covert missions for the Black Fang guild and is feared by enemy clans.

title: Fire Warrior
description: BlazeKnight harnesses fire’s raw power to overwhelm foes. His fiery aura burns nearby enemies while his sword ignites with flames during every battle strike.
details: He has mastered all fire-based spells, leading fire raids with intense aggression. BlazeKnight once cleared the Flame Temple solo and is the guild’s top damage dealer.

title: Frost Mage
description: IceQueen uses powerful ice magic to freeze enemies and slow down battles. Her control of temperature can shift tides in both duels and war zones.
details: She casts wide-range frost storms and ice barriers to trap foes. IceQueen leads PvP events with strategy, making her a tactical leader in ranked matches.

title: Heavy Tank
description: RogueTitan is a massive frontline defender with unmatched resilience. His armor absorbs major damage, making him the ultimate shield for his team in raids.
details: He uses giant hammers and taunts enemies to protect allies. Known for solo tanking bosses, RogueTitan is respected across the kingdom’s toughest dungeons and arenas.

title: Speed Archer
description: WindWalker is a lightning-fast archer with deadly precision. Her arrows travel like gusts, hitting multiple targets before they even realize she's there.
details: She specializes in hit-and-run tactics and evasive maneuvers. WindWalker trains in the Sky Forest and often assists squads with critical ranged support during siege battles.

title: Thunder Warrior
description: StormBreaker channels electric energy through his weapons, delivering high-voltage strikes. His lightning attacks stun enemies, disrupting formations and leaving them vulnerable.
details: He commands the Thunder Guard and rides into battle with electrified gear. StormBreaker thrives in stormy zones and leads elite missions in high-risk territories.
